answerText: The Unbearable Lightness of Being[10] This Czech author wrote The Unbearable Lightness of Being.
heading: DRAGOON |2013 | 7 | 17 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This novel describes how Josef Stalin's son Yakov got into a fight with some Brits about how they use the latrine, which leads him to later get electrocuted. [10] Name this novel, which traces the tumultuous lives of Tomas and Tereza, who endure the Soviet invasion of their country.
